group_1.textLeft: Just when we were about to give 'em the@slip, too...

group_1.textRight: Give them the slip...? What's going on?

group_1.textLeft: ...You know that treasure hunt back there?
I didn't mention it was all part of a show@called "Sayu-Spice" or whatever.
Now it turns out their entire crew just rolled@in to film some other project instead.

group_1.textRight: Oh, yes, "Sayu-Slice"...

group_1.textLeft: ...We don't have to break the truth to@those two, right?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I see...

group_1.textLeft: What's that?

group_1.textRight: Oh, nothing♪
Just leave it to me!
I apologize for having to cut this short, but@we really must be on our way home.
Oh?

group_1.textLeft: I want to watch them record Sayu-Sayu's show...

group_1.textCenter: And I'm really curious to see what an idol's@job is like...

group_1.textRight: I'm afraid we can't do that. This isn't just@for fun - it's serious work.
Exactly. We mustn't get in the way of her job.

group_1.textLeft: Umm...we're all Magical Girl friends, though...
Why don't I ask my manager to see if you@guys can stay?

group_1.textRight: Really?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, really!
In return, I'd be super grateful if you guys@could cheer me on!
That way, I can do my very best!

group_1.textCenter: Of course we will! We'll be supporting you@from the sidelines!

group_1.textRight: I'm very sorry for intruding on you like this…@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]But I'm hugely grateful nonetheless.
Well, but–! There's just one thing, though - that helicopter is still waiting for us.
They came all this way to pick us up. We@shouldn't tarry.

group_1.textLeft: If you'd rather stay, you can return home@with us by boat.
I'm pretty sure there should be more than@enough room for everyone.
Yeah, there should be nooo problem at all!@I'll ask the crew to let you ride, too!

group_1.textRight: ...Mm. That resolves all of our problems, then.
But, you see...erm…?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...we don't exactly know what this'll involve,@though, or if we're gonna get put in danger again.

group_1.textRight: Kyoko...!

group_1.textLeft: Danger...? What we're doing surely can't be@that dangerous, right?
All the filming will be done on the beach. We@won't be going too deeply into the island.

group_1.textRight: And merely observing us shouldn't put you@in danger of any sort.

group_1.textLeft: To give you an idea of what to expect, the@premise of this special is basically,

group_1.narration: "You and Sayuki have washed up on a deserted@island, and you must work together in order to survive."

group_1.textLeft: Basically, it'll be a short form series with just four episodes at most. You'll have to answer all sorts@of questions.

group_1.narration: Like, for example,@"Today's dinner is...@A: Freshly caught fish@B: Cup noodles that washed up on the shore@C: These brightly-colored mushrooms we foraged"

group_1.textRight: There'll be a quiz like that in between@each episode!
Viewers will have a specific deadline to@cast their vote.

group_1.narration: The story advances using the option@that received the most votes.@If the wrong answers are chosen,@then Sayuki will be put in danger and rescued,@resulting in a game over.

group_1.textLeft: And that's not all!
If viewers choose the correct answers and@make it all the way to the end,
[chara:303350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'll get to win a prize created by the master@swordsmith Kamigiri!

group_1.textRight: I really hope your fans will pick all the@right answers!

group_1.textLeft: Same here!

group_1.narration: "But as long as the fans enjoy it...@Even if... Even if I don't get the sword...@Urgh...I'll...I'll..."

group_1.textLeft: No matter what, I'll have NO regrets!!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Goodness, that was assertive...!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant* *Pant*

group_1.textRight: This sounds awesome! What's it called?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the full title is...

group_1.narration: ―Sayuki―@Sayu-Sayu's Deserted Island Survival Date:@Can Sayu-Sayu Make It Back Alive?

group_1.textRight: ...The hell kinda title is that?

group_1.textLeft: It's something we all came up with together!

group_1.textRight: Wow! That sounds really interesting! I'm super@excited to watch and see how it goes!

group_1.textCenter: There you are, Sayuki - wait, who are these girls?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's my manager! Give me a second to@explain everything!

group_1.textRight: Goodwill and innocence be damned… I certainly botched that one.
...Is this how you felt during that treasure@hunt, Kyoko?

group_1.textLeft: Yup.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry, but could you assist me for just@a little while longer?
I want to ensure Ui and Karin's treasured@memories remain untarnished...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's fine. We both want the same thing,@anyway.

group_1.textCenter: Members of the audience, please stay behind@the rope.

group_1.textRight: ...Let's do our best.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's do this.

group_1.narration: <After the filming was over, the boat made its return...@It seems like Kyoko and Mitama were fast asleep@the entire way home.>
